author: Jordyn Tilchen
title: Demi Lovato Gives A Status Update On Past Friendships And Relationships
description: Demi Lovato opened up in a new 'Harper's Bazaar' interview about the status of her relationship with ex-boyfriend Wilmer Valderrama, and her friendships with Ariana Grande, Miley Cyrus, and Selena Gomez.
content: Demi Lovato might be hunkering down at home right now, but make no mistake: She's happy. Not only does she appear to be self-quarantining with rumored boyfriend Max Ehrich, but in an interview with Harper's Bazaar out yesterday (April 14), the "Anyone" singer… [+3026 chars]
